place.name: SOPWORTH
place.gazetteerText: SOPWORTH, a parish in Malmsbury district, Wilts; 7 miles E by S of Wickwar r. station. Post town, Chippenham. Acres, 1,011. Real property, £1,685. Pop., 214. Houses, 49. The manor belongs to the Duke of Beaufort. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Gloucester and Bristol. Value, £265.* Patron, the Duke of Beanfort. The church is ancient. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
